headline: Salesforce Lands Major Army AI Deal As Valuation Discount Persists
summary: Salesforce (NYSE:CRM) has been awarded a 10 year, US$5.6b contract with the U.S. Army to deliver secure data and AI technologies. The deal is described as one of the largest government cloud and AI agreements to date, focused on federal digital modernization. Salesforce also launched EMBERPOINT, an AI driven public safety alliance with Lockheed Martin, PG&E, and Wells Fargo. EMBERPOINT aims to apply Salesforce’s AI agent platforms, autonomous tech, and data tools to wildfire prevention and...
